        public static void setTemplateFactory(TemplateFactory templateFactory)

      • init

        Init TemplateFactory.

      • loadTemplate

        public abstract Template loadTemplate(java.lang.String path)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Load Template from path.
        参数:
        path - Template file path, relative with webapp's root path.
        返回:
        Template instance.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - If load failed, e.g., file not found.
